points.title: easy to read

case.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
case.localized_title: facile à lire
case.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

points.title: translated into only a few languages
points.analysis: translated into only a few languages

case.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
case.localized_title: traduits dans quelques langues seulement
case.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.

points.title: court of law is in location X
points.analysis: "The Services and their Terms are governed by French law, wherever originates the use of the Services. If friendly solutions can’t be found or are not sought, French courts within the competence of the Cour d’appel de Paris are the only courts competent to know of any litigation arose from the current Terms."

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.localized_title: La cour de justice se trouve dans le lieu X
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.analysis: Full quote: "Therefore, we decline all responsibility, of any nature:in case of inaccuracy, lack of update, error or omissions in information available through the Services;"

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

case.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs que sa politique de confidentialité ne s'applique pas aux sites web de tiers
case.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

case.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez limiter la façon dont vos informations sont utilisées par des tiers et par le service
case.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Ce service vous permet de récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

case.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
case.localized_title: Les adresses IP des visiteurs du site web ne sont pas suivies
case.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

case.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
case.localized_title: La durée de conservation des données du service est limitée au minimum nécessaire à la réalisation de ses objectifs.
case.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.

points.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès à vos données personnelles et leur suppression
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: No need to register

case.title: No need to register
case.localized_title: Pas besoin de s'enregistrer
case.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

case.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more
case.localized_title: L'accessibilité à ce service est garantie à 99 % ou plus.

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

case.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
case.localized_title: Ils peuvent cesser de fournir le service à tout moment
case.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
case.localized_title: Le tribunal qui régit les conditions est situé dans une juridiction plus favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.

points.title: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality

case.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality
case.localized_title: Ce service ne donne aucune garantie de qualité
case.description: The Service doesn't warrant or guarantee the quality of the products or services provided.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il entend utiliser vos données à caractère personnel
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

case.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
case.localized_title: Le service peut modifier ses conditions à tout moment, mais l'utilisateur recevra une notification des modifications.
case.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: you can leave at any time
points.analysis: "As the name says, the right to oppose allows you to oppose data processing by Qwant. You may, for instance, choose to delete your account."

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: vous pouvez partir à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: critical changes without user involvement
points.analysis: "We reserve the right to modify the terms at any time so they can fit the evolutions of the services of QWANT and/or their operation.  You will be informed, by email and/or by any other appropriate means on the affected Services, of all substantial changes to the Terms, prior to their entry into force."

case.title: Critical changes to the terms are made without user involvement
case.localized_title: des changements critiques sans l'intervention de l'utilisateur
case.description: They may significantly update the terms at any time and at their sole discretion, meaning for any reason and without necessarily taking into account the interests or suggestions of the users of the Service.

points.title: you are responsible for what you publish
points.analysis:
"If you have created a user account, you bear the sole responsibility for information that you fill in when registering or when modifying your account."

And for boards (https://about.qwant.com/legal/terms-of-service/qwant-boards/):

"You acknowledge that you alone are responsible for the contents and consequences following their aggregation and their being shared on your Boards.  You agree to put the required permissions (rights, licenses, consent and/or authorization) allowing you to share other’s information.  On the other hand, you are not allowed to publish content that includes elements you are not legally authorized to possess."

"You will be held responsible for all content that may infringe upon the rights of others or applicable laws, including rules related to the right to one’s image and rights regarding intellectual property and shared content."

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: vous êtes responsable de ce que vous publiez
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service peut communiquer vos informations personnelles à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Des tiers peuvent être impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

case.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs disposent d'un délai réduit pour intenter une action en justice contre le service
case.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

points.title: This service does not track you

case.title: You are not being tracked
case.localized_title: Ce service ne vous suit pas
case.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".

points.title: This service will warn users about website maintenance
points.analysis: Full quote: "You are informed that the Services are operational 24 hours a day and 7 days a week, and you recognize that this accessibility may however be interrupted in case of force majeure or technical difficulties. We shall not be held responsible for network or servers dysfunctions of any other event that is out of our control, which would impede or degrade access to our Services. We reserve the right to interrupt, suspend momentarily or modify without prior notice access to all or parts of the Services, in order to maintain or control them, or to do tests. Such interruption, suspension or modification can not be entitled to obligations or compensations. We will do our best to inform you beforehand."

case.title: You will be notified about website maintenance
case.localized_title: Ce service avertit les utilisateurs de la maintenance du site web
case.description: Users will be notified before their experience is impacted due to website maintenance.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: You can delete your content from this service

case.title: You can delete your content from this service
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez supprimer votre contenu de ce service
case.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.

points.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

case.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
case.localized_title: Le service n'est pas responsable des liens ou des contenus (clairement) cités par des fournisseurs de contenu tiers.

points.title: The user is informed about security practices

case.title: Information is provided about security practices
case.localized_title: L'utilisateur est informé des pratiques de sécurité
case.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
